column3: I always take them here.  Lou's/Pizano's style is my favorite deep dish
column4: and while I think Pizano's might have a pinch better food
column8: and a solid (but definitely not exceptional) beer selection round out a great meal.  Be sure to call ahead and/or order salad and appetizers
column9: because the wait for a deep dish pizza is usually 45 minutes.
